bibl.title: P. Artemid.: The Images.
bibl.note: P. Artemid. (= M.-P.3 168.02; LDAB 7132). - Genuine or Fake? "In the absence of any conclusive evidence against the authenticity of the papyrus, the images do not in their own right help to support the argument against it. My hunch would be that it is genuine." - Three Lives or One? - P. Artemid. and the Illustrated Book. - P. Artemid. and the Problem of the Pattern-Book. - Conventionalism and Image Production.
